title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Strengthening Interprofessional Collaboration Competencies in Healthcare

context.additional_context: A course emphasizing teamwork skill development through community-based practicums, with learning conducted via mobile devices in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% competency in collaborative performance within a simulated environment by applying effective communication skills among medical professionals
Learners improve task distribution efficiency within teams by over 75% through role allocation and responsibility awareness assessments
Learners score 85 points or higher in case analysis evaluations by applying a patient-centered integrated approach
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
